game.name: GT Bike Simulator
game.description:
Do you think that you can drive on any track irrespective of multiple hurdles and obstacles? Are you a lover of amazing motorbike simulator? Join GT Bike Simulator and get ready to perform many death-defying stunts and grab some rewards for your every successful trick! Take your seat on a beautifully-designed bike and prove the world that you are the best stuntman on this planet! The entire city will be yours. You can spot multiple buildings and vehicles in the city. 

When you click the play button, you would find yourself sitting on a racking bike. Put your driving abilities and be prepared to get through all of the obstacles and reach to the red signs in this html5 bike racing game! Multiple rewards are waiting for you. Complete your mission and move to the advanced level where challenges would be more tricky and complex! Race with your friends on your bike and escape before the police comes and arrests you! 

Be prepared to jump from roof to roof and make your bike fly through the air and complete the red marked points on the map you see on the screen in this brand new racing game! You would have only the limited time to finish your level so be careful and try to be fast to complete your mission. Making even a small mistake can cost you a big loss. Multiple levels, beautiful graphics and simple controls will be enough to keep you glued to the screen for long in this 3D bike simulator game. Enjoy more driving simulation games and have fun with your friends for free on atmegame.com, no download required
